channel.title: Utilities on benjiaomodular
channel.description: Recent content in Utilities on benjiaomodular

item.title: CE2 LFO
item.description: A low frequency oscillator based on the Boss CE2 Chorus pedal LFO section

item.title: euro2breadboard
item.description: A utility for connecting Eurorack +/-12V power to breadboards

item.title: Guitar2Synth
item.description: An adapter for boosting guitar output level up to synth level and synth level down to guitar effects level
